channel.title: Custom sprites
channel.description:
Helo.. i want to make it so that when i speak it comes out has a custom sprite......
I've added custom sprites to my client.. and i was thinking dont i need to add sumthing in the server files...
Im currently usin deltascape source
and usin bluurs client
Please help thanks
